en: The nervous girl is in the habit of chewing the end of her pencil.
zh: 那个爱紧张的小姑娘总爱啃笔头。

en: Good care should be taken of the pearl.

en: The truth knocked the breath out of him.
zh: 真相让他半天没喘过气来。

en: The fact was brought to light.

en: Few people know the true meaning.

en: It was stupid of you to have turned down the offer.
zh: 你把那机会推了也太傻了。

en: I rejected the offer.

en: I accept the offer.

en: Your offer is a life-saver.
zh: 你的提议真是帮了大忙。

en: I had no choice but to accept the offer.
zh: 我没得选，只能接受了。

en: The offer is worthy of being considered.

en: The offer is too good to turn down.

en: The forest is full of birds and animals of all kinds.
zh: 森林里到处都是各种各样的鸟和动物。

en: The animals in the forest died off.
zh: 森林里的动物都死光了。

en: There lived an old couple in the woods.
zh: 树林里住着一对老夫妇。

en: Birds abound in the woods.

en: The new medicine demonstrated an immediate effect.

en: The manner in which the new salesman made top sales level was an eye-opener to his supervisor.

en: The newspaper company has ten aircraft.
zh: 这家报社有十架飞机。

en: The newsman has a nose for news.

en: Please give me the paper when you have done with it.

en: The newspaper has a large circulation.

en: The newspaper called for the government to stop inflation.
zh: 报纸呼吁政府抑制通货膨胀。

zh: 这份报纸的发行量只有对手的三分之一。

en: The paper didn't carry the story.
zh: 报纸上没登那则新闻。

en: I slipped on the paper and hurt my leg.
zh: 我踩在报纸上滑了一跤，把腿摔伤了。

en: The new teacher clicked with the students.
zh: 新老师跟学生们挺合得来的。

en: The new boy is distant because he does not know us.
zh: 那新来的男孩挺生疏的，因为还不认识我们。

en: The new student became friends with Ken.
zh: 那个新同学和肯成了朋友。

en: The new product is on sale.
zh: 新产品上市了。

en: The new product will not be distributed through conventional channels.
zh: 新产品不会通过传统渠道销售。

en: The rookie breathed new life into the team.
zh: 那个菜鸟给队伍带来了新气象。

en: The advance reviews of the new film are very favorable.
zh: 这部新片的预告评论非常不错。

en: The new couple have gone off to Hawaii on their honeymoon.
zh: 那对新人去夏威夷度蜜月了。

en: The newly married couple walked hand in hand.
zh: 刚结婚的小两口手牵着手走着。

en: The new model clicked with the public.
zh: 新款在大众中挺受欢迎的。

en: The new model car will be brought to market in May.
zh: 那款新车五月份上市。

en: The new model car was put through several tests.
zh: 那款新车经过了好几项测试。

en: Those new model cars are on the market.
zh: 那些新款车已经上市了。

en: I learned about the new book by the advertisement in the magazine.
zh: 我是从杂志广告上看到那本新书的。

en: It is impossible to get him to understand the new theory.
zh: 想让他理解那个新理论简直不可能。

en: The new theory is too abstract for ordinary people.
zh: 那个新理论对一般人来说太抽象了。

en: Your new hat is very becoming on you.
zh: 你的新帽子很衬你。

en: Under the new law, husbands can take days off to care for their children.
zh: 根据新法律，丈夫也可以请假照顾孩子。

en: The new method was anything but ideal.
zh: 新办法一点儿也不理想。

en: The new law has deprived the citizens of their liberty.
zh: 新法律剥夺了公民的自由。

en: The new store is going to open next week.
zh: 那家新店下周开张。

en: The new method is well worth consideration.
zh: 这个新方法很值得考虑。

en: The new title has good connotations.
zh: 这个新标题寓意很好。

en: He argued that the new policy was bound to drive the economy into recession.
zh: 他认为新政策肯定会让经济陷入衰退。

en: The new library has been under construction since last year.
zh: 新图书馆从去年就开始建了。

en: The new document system is worth $4,000.
zh: 这个新文档系统值四千美金。

en: The new car is hers.
zh: 那辆新车是她的。

en: The new job challenged his skill.
zh: 这份新工作很考验他的能力。

en: The new nation is under the economic influence of Japan.
zh: 这个新国家在经济上受日本影响。

en: Someday the new research work will be completed.
zh: 总有一天这项新研究会完成的。

en: The new building is enormous.
zh: 那栋新楼大得惊人。

en: I cannot agree with you as regards the new plan.
zh: 关于那个新计划，我没法同意你的看法。

en: The new bridge is under construction.
zh: 新桥正在施工。

en: The new machine will take a lot of room.
zh: 这台新机器很占地方。

en: Having discussed the new project for three hours, we concluded that Andrew's plan was the best.
zh: 讨论了三个小时新项目后，我们觉得安德鲁的方案最好。

en: The new machine will be in use.
zh: 这台新机器就要投入使用了。

en: The new school failed to take into account the special needs of young people.
zh: 这所新学校没考虑到年轻人的特殊需求。

en: The new movie was a big hit.
zh: 那部新电影大火。

en: The new hotel invited suggestions from the guests.
zh: 那家新酒店征求了客人的建议。

en: The new plan is based on our idea.
zh: 新计划是根据我们的想法制定的。

en: The new tie goes with your jacket.
zh: 这条新领带跟你的外套很搭。

en: The new tunnel will link Britain and France.
zh: 新隧道将连接英国和法国。

en: The new designs are much better than the old ones.
zh: 新设计比旧的好多了。

en: The new style seems to have caught on this year.
zh: 这种新风格今年好像流行起来了。

en: The new supermarket was opened last month.
zh: 那家新超市上个月开业了。

en: The umpire was partial to the team from his country.
zh: 裁判偏袒他自己国家的球队。

en: The bedroom was laden with beautiful ornaments.
zh: 卧室里摆满了漂亮的装饰品。

en: The devout Christian persists in his belief.
zh: 那个虔诚的基督徒坚持他的信仰。

en: Cholera germs were found in the food.
zh: 食物中发现了霍乱弧菌。

en: The table groaned with food.
zh: 桌上摆满了丰盛的食物。

en: The food was not fit for man or beast.
zh: 那些食物简直没法吃。

en: The meal includes dessert as well as beverage.
zh: 这顿饭包括甜点和饮料。

en: The meal satisfied his hunger.
zh: 这顿饭让他吃饱了。

en: Diet accounts for more than one million deaths.
zh: 饮食问题导致了超过一百万人死亡。

en: The food tasted slightly of garlic.
zh: 这菜有点大蒜味。

en: The food went bad in the hot weather.
zh: 天气太热，食物变质了。

en: The girl with fair skin passes for nineteen.
zh: 那个皮肤白皙的女孩看起来也就十九岁。

en: The color went beautifully with her hair.
zh: 这个颜色跟她的头发很配。

en: The color goes against her taste.
zh: 这个颜色不合她的口味。

en: That color is becoming to your face.
zh: 那个颜色很衬你的脸。

en: The colors shade from yellow into green.
zh: 颜色从黄色渐变到绿色。

en: The color is purple rather than pink.
zh: 这个颜色与其说是粉色，不如说是紫色。

en: We call that color "midnight blue".
zh: 我们管那个颜色叫“午夜蓝”。

en: Proper qualifications are required for the position.
zh: 这个职位需要相应的资质。

en: The prime purpose of the profession is the rendering of a public service.
zh: 这个职业的首要目的是服务大众。

en: There were a good many candidates for the position.
zh: 那个职位有很多应聘者。

en: Six people applied for the job, but none of them were employed.
zh: 有六个人申请了那份工作，但谁也没被录用。

en: The colony declared independence and became a republic.
zh: 殖民地宣布独立，成了共和国。

en: The colony declared independence.
zh: 殖民地宣布独立了。

en: The colony has not declared independence as yet.
zh: 殖民地还没有宣布独立。

en: The roses were in full bloom in the botanical garden.
zh: 植物园里的玫瑰正开得旺呢。

en: Pull the plant up by the roots.
zh: 把这植物连根拔出来。

en: Don't expose the plant to direct sunlight.
zh: 别把这植物放在大太阳底下晒。

en: The plants were damaged by the late frost.
zh: 那些植物被晚霜给冻坏了。

en: The plants were damaged by the frost.
zh: 那些植物被霜冻坏了。

en: The plants died for lack of water.
zh: 植物因为缺水都枯死了。

en: The plants withered because they had no water.
zh: 因为没水，植物都干枯了。

en: This plant grew little by little.
zh: 这植物是一点点长起来的。

en: The plant ranges from the north of Europe to the south.
zh: 这种植物从北欧到南欧都有。

en: The plant has an underground stem.
zh: 这植物有地下茎。

en: The plants are peculiar to the district.
zh: 这些植物是这儿特有的。

en: I will make certain of the situation.
zh: 我去确认一下情况。

en: I am sure the condition will turn for the better.
zh: 我肯定情况会好起来的。

en: War broke out when the treaty was ignored.
zh: 协议被无视后，战争就爆发了。

en: The clause provides that all decisions shall be made by majority vote.
zh: 条款规定所有决定都要少数服从多数。

en: The treaty is now a dead letter.
zh: 那条约现在就是张废纸。

en: Terms were signed between Japan, Germany, Great Britain and the United States.
zh: 日、德、英、美几国签署了协议。

en: I am not at all pleased with the condition.
zh: 我对现在的状况一点儿也不满意。

en: We will only consent on that condition.
zh: 只有那个条件满足了，我们才会答应。

en: The information was quite useless.
zh: 这消息一点用都没有。

en: The information was given away to the newspaper prior to the announcement.
zh: 还没公布呢，消息就被透露给报社了。

en: The information is useful to a great many people.
zh: 这信息对很多人都挺有用的。

en: Some of the information is very important.
zh: 有些信息挺重要的。

en: The correctness of the information is doubtful.
zh: 这消息准不准还不好说。

en: The information counts for much to us.
zh: 这消息对我们来说非常关键。

en: The information is in a file in my computer.
zh: 资料都在我电脑里的一个文件里存着呢。

en: The information is very important to us.
zh: 这消息对我们特别重要。

en: This was faulty information.
zh: 这消息不靠谱。

en: The information reinforced his opinions.
zh: 这消息让他更坚定了自己的看法。

en: The passion has burned itself out in him.
zh: 他的激情已经消磨殆尽了。

en: I want to see the scene in slow motion.
zh: 我想看看这段的慢镜头。

en: The scene was embedded in his memory.
zh: 那个画面深深地印在了他的脑海里。

en: The scene impressed itself on my memory.
zh: 那个场景让我记忆深刻。

en: The scene was shown in slow motion.
zh: 那个镜头用了慢动作。

en: Whoever visits the place admires its beautiful scenery.
zh: 谁来这儿都会被这美景给迷住。

en: I have visited the place time after time.
zh: 这地方我来过好多次了。

en: The place was alive with creative young people.
zh: 这地方到处都是充满活力的年轻人。

en: The place is worth visiting at least once.
zh: 这地方起码得去一次。

en: The place is very much built up now.
zh: 这地方现在到处都是楼。

en: The place is convenient for swimming.
zh: 这儿游泳挺方便的。

en: The place is certainly worth seeing.
zh: 这地方绝对值得一去。

en: The place is invested with an air of mystery.
zh: 这地方透着一股神秘感。

en: The place is worth visiting twice.
zh: 这地方值得再去一次。

en: The place is at its best in spring.
zh: 这地方春天的时候最美。

en: The place is easy to reach from here.
zh: 从这儿去那儿很方便。

en: In that case, you are right.
zh: 要是那样的话，你说得对。

en: In that case, call the police.
zh: 既然这样，那就报警吧。

en: He says things on the spur of the moment.
zh: 他说话总是随口就来。

en: The place just doesn't look as good as it used to.
zh: 这地方看着没以前那么好了。

en: There were not many present.
zh: 没多少人到场。

en: Now, all heads turn toward the dean, who sits surrounded by a faint halo of light.
zh: 现在，大家的目光都投向了系主任，他坐在那里，周身笼罩着一层淡淡的光晕。

en: No one happened to be there.
zh: 刚好那时候没人在那儿。

en: The air was charged with tension.
zh: 气氛变得非常紧张。

en: Those who were present were very glad at the news.
zh: 在场的人听到这个消息都很高兴。

en: The girls present received a shock.
zh: 在场的女孩们都吓了一跳。

en: One of the gentlemen who were present addressed the pupils.
zh: 在座的一位先生给学生们讲了话。

en: Stopgap measures won't make a dent in drug addiction.
zh: 权宜之计根本解决不了毒瘾问题。

en: The castle stands three miles north of the town.
zh: 城堡就在镇子北边三英里的地方。

en: The castle was transformed into a marvelous museum.
zh: 城堡被改造成了一座很棒的博物馆。

en: The castle was burnt to ashes.
zh: 城堡被烧成了灰烬。

en: The castle has been restored and is open to the public.
zh: 城堡已经修缮好了，现在对外开放。

en: The castle is now in ruins.
zh: 城堡现在已经成了一片废墟。

en: The castle was in disrepair.
zh: 城堡破败不堪，年久失修。

en: The castle is worth visiting.
zh: 那座城堡值得去看看。

en: The castle is a good distance off.
zh: 城堡离这儿还挺远的。

en: When was the castle built?
zh: 城堡是什么时候建的？

en: The castle dates back to 1610.
zh: 这座城堡的历史可以追溯到1610年。

en: The castle, burnt down in 1485, was not rebuilt.
zh: 城堡在1485年被烧毁后，就没有再重建过。

en: Hearing the joke, he burst into laughter.
zh: 听了那个笑话，他忍不住大笑起来。

en: That joke isn't funny.
zh: 那个笑话一点也不好笑。

en: I cannot help laughing at the joke.
zh: 听到那个笑话，我忍不住想笑。

en: We could not help laughing at the joke.
zh: 听到那个笑话，我们都忍不住笑出声了。

en: I didn't get the joke.
zh: 我没听懂那个笑话的笑点。

en: The coat has worn well.
zh: 这件大衣很耐穿。

en: The jacket was cut too long.
zh: 这件夹克裁得太长了。

en: The good driver wove his way through the traffic.
zh: 那位老司机在车流中穿梭自如。

en: I met some other people in addition.
zh: 另外，我还见了几个人。

en: The boss has a high opinion of his secretary.
zh: 老板对他的秘书评价很高。

en: And, to make the matter worse, he has taken to drinking.
zh: 更糟糕的是，他现在开始酗酒了。

en: To make matters worse, her husband died.
zh: 更糟的是，她丈夫去世了。

en: Besides, it's starting to rain.
zh: 而且，天也开始下雨了。

en: The senator remained neutral in the furious controversy.
zh: 在那场激烈的争论中，参议员保持了中立。

en: The ice is thick enough to walk on.
zh: 冰够厚了，可以在上面走。

en: The senator avowed his devotion to his constituents.
zh: 参议员宣誓他会全心全意为选民服务。

en: Don't sit upon it.
zh: 别坐在上面。

en: I paid five dollars in addition.
zh: 我额外又付了五美元。

en: Furthermore, experiments were never carried out against the rules but were performed always well within them - otherwise they would not be recognized as experiments at all.
zh: 而且，实验从来都不是违规进行的，而是一直严格遵守规则，否则根本就不能算作是实验。

en: In addition, I have to interview a professor.
zh: 另外，我还得去采访一位教授。

en: He was not aware that the praise was a satire in disguise.
zh: 他没意识到那番夸奖其实是变相的讽刺。

en: The prize money allowed him to buy a guitar.
zh: 他用奖金买了一把吉他。

en: The prize money enabled me to go on a world cruise.
zh: 这笔奖金让我能去环游世界了。

en: The prize won't be given to her.
zh: 这个奖不会发给她。

en: The elephant was brought to the zoo.
zh: 大象被带到了动物园。

en: The elephant is liked by little children.
zh: 小朋友们都很喜欢大象。

en: The elephant won't move an inch.
zh: 大象纹丝不动。

en: The evidence corresponds to his previous statement.
zh: 证据和他之前的说法对得上。

en: The evidence was in his favor.
zh: 证据对他很有利。

en: The evidence left little room for doubt.
zh: 证据确凿，几乎没有什么可怀疑的。

en: The evidence left no room for uncertainty.
zh: 证据确凿，不容置疑。

en: The evidence proved him to be innocent.
zh: 证据证明了他是清白的。

en: His story of the collision agrees with mine.
zh: 他对撞车经过的说法和我的一样。

en: That portrait reminds me of someone I knew a long time ago.
zh: 那幅画像让我想起很久以前认识的一个人。

en: The portrait was taken from the wall.
zh: 墙上的那幅画像被取下来了。

en: The portrait shows the profile of a beautiful woman.
zh: 那幅画画的是一个美女的侧面。

en: The portrait looks exactly like the real thing.
zh: 那幅画画得跟真人一模一样。

en: The ministry administers the internal affairs.
zh: 这个部负责处理内政。

en: The brave fireman rescued a boy from the burning house.
zh: 那个勇敢的消防员从着火的房子里救出了一个男孩。

en: Lots of herons live in the marsh.
zh: 沼泽里生活着很多苍鹭。

en: The floor is covered with a thick carpet.
zh: 地板上铺着厚厚的地毯。

en: All but the boy were asleep.
zh: 除了那个男孩，大家都睡着了。

en: There was no one that did not admire the boy.
zh: 没有人不佩服那个男孩。

en: Six were invited, including the boy.
zh: 一共请了六个人，包括那个男孩。

en: It's no use trying to persuade the boy.
zh: 劝那个男孩是没用的。

en: Don't punish the boy severely; go easy on him.
zh: 别重罚那个男孩，对他宽容点。

en: We did everything we could to save the boy.
zh: 我们想方设法去救那个男孩。

en: The boy said a wolf would come.
zh: 那个男孩说狼要来了。

en: The boy made his parents happy.
zh: 那个男孩让他的父母很开心。

en: The boy solved the simultaneous equation with ease.
zh: 那个男孩轻而易举地解出了联立方程。

en: The boy was accompanied by his parents.
zh: 那个男孩由父母陪同。

en: The boy is obedient to his parents.
zh: 那个男孩很听父母的话。

en: The boy was taken away from school by his parents.
zh: 那个男孩被父母从学校带走了。

en: The boy was to lose his mother at an early age.
zh: 那个男孩在很小的时候就失去了母亲。

en: The boy learned the famous poem by heart soon after he read it.
zh: 那个男孩读了之后很快就背下了那首名诗。

en: We found the boy interested.
zh: 我们发现那个男孩很感兴趣。

en: The boy was searching for the lost key.
zh: 那个男孩在找弄丢了的钥匙。

en: The boy pretended he could read, but he was holding the book upside down.
zh: 那个男孩装作能看懂，但其实书都拿反了。

en: I hear he traveled by bicycle from Hokkaido to Kyushu.
zh: 我听说他骑自行车从北海道一直骑到了九州。

en: The boy has a hunger for adventure.

zh: 这部小说是在他去世后出版的。

en: The novel is centered on the Civil War.
zh: 这部小说是以内战为背景的。

en: The novel takes its title from the Bible.
zh: 这部小说的书名出自《圣经》。

en: The novel has been translated into many languages.
zh: 这部小说已经被翻译成了很多种语言。

en: The novel is worthy of praise.
zh: 这部小说值得称赞。

en: The novel gives a manifold picture of human life.
zh: 这部小说展现了丰富多彩的人间百态。

en: That novel isn't for children.
zh: 那本小说不是给小孩看的。

en: I have read the novel before.
zh: 我以前读过这本小说。

en: Mr Robinson didn't write the novel.
zh: 这本小说不是罗宾逊先生写的。

en: The novel has sold almost 20000 copies.
zh: 这部小说卖了快两万本了。

en: The novel ends with the heroine's death.
zh: 这部小说以女主角的去世结尾。

en: The novel, the author of which is a famous singer, is selling well.
zh: 这部小说的作者是个著名的歌手，书卖得挺火的。

en: Who is the author of the novel?
zh: 这部小说的作者是谁？

en: The novel had an initial print-run of 10,000.
zh: 这部小说首印了一万册。

en: I don't understand this novel's plot.
zh: 我看不懂这本小说的情节。

en: The heroine of the novel committed suicide.
zh: 小说的女主角自杀了。

en: Let me have the novel when you have done with it.
zh: 你看完之后把那本小说给我看看。

en: The small country was annexed to its larger neighbor.
zh: 那个小国被它的大邻国吞并了。

en: The small country is making great efforts to keep up with other developing countries.
zh: 那个小国正努力赶上其他发展中国家。

en: The cabin was built of logs.
zh: 那个小木屋是用圆木盖的。

en: The hut kept the rain and dew out after a fashion.
zh: 那个棚子勉强能遮风挡雨。

en: The hut was set on fire.
zh: 那个小屋被放火烧了。

en: The cottage looked as if nobody were living in it.
zh: 那个小屋看起来好像没人住。

en: The small animal gave off a bad smell.
zh: 那个小动物身上散发出一股难闻的味道。

en: The small island came into sight.
zh: 那个小岛出现在了视线里。

en: These smaller parts are called counties, and each county has a county council, like Westhamptonshire County Council.
zh: 这些较小的部分叫作郡，每个郡都有郡议会，比如西汉普顿郡议会。

en: The little boy felt secure in his father's arms.
zh: 那个小男孩在爸爸怀里感到很安全。

en: The little boy has lost the money given to him by his father.
zh: 那个小男孩把爸爸给他的钱弄丢了。

en: The small statue is said to be made of fine gold.
zh: 据说那个小雕像是用纯金做的。

en: The little girl grew into a beautiful woman.
zh: 那个小女孩长成了一个大美女。

en: The little girl was crying for the teddy bear.
zh: 那个小女孩哭着想要那个泰迪熊。

en: The little girl managed to keep silent, having been terrified by the lightning.
zh: 那个小女孩被闪电吓坏了，一句话也不敢说。

en: The small dog tried to get away.
zh: 那个小狗试图逃跑。

en: The big dog remained calm as the small dog hung from its leg.
zh: 尽管小狗咬着大狗的腿不放，大狗还是很淡定。

en: The little flowers open at night.
zh: 这些小花在晚上盛开。

en: The small boat was at the mercy of the wind.
zh: 小船在风中摇摆不定，只能随风漂流。

en: The little boy gazed at the huge elephant, eyes wide open.
zh: 小男孩瞪大眼睛盯着那头巨象。

en: The little girl never smiles at anyone other than Emily.
zh: 那个小女孩除了艾米莉不对任何人笑。

en: The officer seemed to be afraid of their revenge.
zh: 那个军官似乎害怕他们的报复。

en: The general lived the rest of his life peacefully after his retirement.
zh: 那个将军退休后平静地度过了余生。

en: The goods will be delivered free of charge.
zh: 货物会免费配送。

en: The goods will be sold on the spot.
zh: 货物会当场售卖。

en: The goods are advertised on TV.
zh: 电视上在给这些产品打广告。

en: The goods were advertised on TV.
zh: 这些产品曾在电视上打过广告。

en: I washed my hands of the whole business.
zh: 这件事我撒手不管了。

en: The shopping district is easily accessible from our house.
zh: 从我们家去购物区很方便。

en: It is rumored that the firm is going to tie up with an American company.
zh: 有传闻说这家公司要和一家美国公司合作。

en: The victory was won at the cost of many lives.
zh: 这场胜利是以许多生命为代价换来的。

en: The victory excited us.
zh: 胜利让我们兴奋不已。

en: The victory was dearly won.
zh: 这场胜利来之不易。

en: Our team was in high spirits because of the victory.
zh: 因为赢了球，我们队士气高涨。

en: His victory made him a hero.
zh: 这次胜利让他成为了英雄。

en: That actress made three entrances onto the stage.
zh: 那个女演员先后三次登台。

en: The wound has not healed yet.
zh: 伤口还没愈合。

en: The actress greeted her fans from the stage.
zh: 那个女演员在台上跟粉丝们打招呼。

en: The actress is very popular with ladies.
zh: 那个女演员很受女性欢迎。

en: The actress was dressed beautifully.
zh: 那个女演员穿得很漂亮。

en: The actress is popular with young people.
zh: 那个女演员很受年轻人欢迎。

en: The actress looks younger than she really is.
zh: 那个女演员看起来比实际年龄要年轻。

en: The actress seems to have walked through her part.
zh: 那个女演员演戏像是在走过场。

en: The actress sued the magazine for libel.
zh: 那个女演员起诉了那家杂志社诽谤。

en: The actress said that she was engaged to a banker.
zh: 那个女演员说她和一个银行家订婚了。

en: The actress was presented a bouquet of flowers after the performance.
zh: 演出结束后，有人给那个女演员送了一束花。

en: The actress brought the whole silly play to life.
zh: 那个女演员把那出无聊的戏演活了。

en: The actress murdered her lines.
zh: 那个女演员把台词念得一塌糊涂。

en: I once saw the actress at a distance.
zh: 我曾经远远地见过那个女演员一面。

en: The actress always wears expensive jewels.
zh: 那个女演员总是戴着昂贵的珠宝。

en: The actress made her debut when she was eight.
zh: 那个女演员八岁就出道了。

en: The actress has a very beautiful name.
zh: 那个女演员的名字很好听。

en: The sales girl waited on me.
zh: 那个女店员接待了我。

en: The rumor is going around that the actress is going to get a divorce.
zh: 有传闻说那个女演员要离婚了。

en: The women are relaxing on the piano.
zh: 那些女人们正靠在钢琴旁休息。

en: The women are in front of a library.
zh: 那些女人们在图书馆前面。

en: The hostess couldn't possibly tolerate his arrogance.
zh: 女主人实在没法忍受他的傲慢。

en: That woman has wrongly accused me.
zh: 那个女人冤枉了我。

en: The women are very supportive.
zh: 那些女人们非常支持。

en: The lady looked sad, also tired.
zh: 那位女士看起来很忧伤，也很疲惫。

en: The woman was at a loss whether to accept his proposal or not.
zh: 那个女人不知道该不该接受他的求婚。

en: The women will fine the man.
zh: 那些女人们要罚那个男人的款。

en: The woman pressed the baby to her.
zh: 那个女人把孩子紧紧抱在怀里。

en: She'll diagnose each person carefully.
zh: 她会仔细地为每个人看病。

en: The woman is taking notes.
zh: 那个女人正在记笔记。

en: The woman speaks as if she were a teacher.
zh: 那个女人说话的语气像个老师。

en: The woman goes by the name of Sue.
zh: 那个女人自称叫苏。

en: The lady moved here a month ago.
zh: 那位女士是一个月前搬来这里的。

en: The lady persisted in wearing such an old-fashioned shirt.
zh: 那位女士坚持要穿那件过时的衬衫。

en: The woman tried to shout out "Help!" but the word stuck in her throat.
zh: 那个女人想大喊“救命”，但话卡在嗓子眼喊不出来。

en: The beauty of that lady was admired by everyone.
zh: 大家都惊叹于那位女士的美貌。

en: The woman's face was marked with grief.
zh: 那个女人的脸上写满了悲伤。

en: The women stuck to their cause.
zh: 那些女人们坚持着她们的事业。

en: Everyone in the girls' class brought their own lunch.
zh: 女生班的每个人都自带了午餐。

en: The woman managed the drunk as if he were a child.
zh: 那个女人像哄小孩一样应付那个酒鬼。

en: The teacher had her eye on me because she thought I was cheating.
zh: 老师一直盯着我，因为她觉得我在作弊。

en: Every time the woman teacher passed the school yard, someone gave her the razz.
zh: 每次那个女老师经过操场，总有人对她起哄。

en: The woman was asked to make allowance for the poor health of the baby.
zh: 那个女人被要求体谅一下孩子身体不好。

en: The women bowed to each other so many times.
zh: 那些女人们互相鞠了好多次躬。

en: It was Tom that saved the girl.
zh: 是汤姆救了那个女孩。

en: How brave of him to jump into the water to save the little girl!
zh: 他居然跳进水里救那个小女孩，真是太勇敢了！

en: The girl was friendly with a bright smile.
zh: 那个女孩笑容灿烂，待人友好。

en: Instantly the girl saw her mother, she burst out crying.
zh: 那女孩一看到她妈，哇地一下就哭了出来。

en: The instant the girl saw her mother, she burst out crying.
zh: 那女孩一见到她妈妈就放声大哭。

en: That girl resembles her mother.
zh: 那女孩长得真像她妈妈。

en: The girl resembles her mother very much.
zh: 那女孩长得特别像她妈。

en: The girl insisted on going shopping with her mother.
zh: 那女孩非要跟她妈去逛街不可。

en: The girl said she was going shopping with her mother, and didn't listen to what I said.
zh: 那女孩说要跟她妈去逛街，根本不听我的。

en: The girl resembled her mother.
zh: 那女孩长得挺像她妈的。

en: The girl entered the room.
zh: 那女孩进屋了。

en: The girl was at the mercy of his cruelty.
zh: 那女孩任由他残忍地摆布。

en: The girl wore a yellow ribbon in her hair.
zh: 那女孩头上扎了个黄色发带。

en: The girl released the birds from the cage.
zh: 那女孩把笼子里的鸟给放了。

en: That girl looks boyish.
zh: 那女孩长得挺男孩子气的。

en: The girl noticed someone go out of the door.
zh: 那女孩看见有人出门了。

en: The little girl asked a question of her teacher.
zh: 那小女孩问了老师一个问题。

en: The girl has a scarf around her neck.
zh: 那女孩脖子上戴着条围巾。

en: The girl has a sweet, small mouth.
zh: 那女孩嘴巴小小的，长得真甜。

en: The girl had a telescope in her hand.
zh: 那女孩手里拿着个望远镜。

en: The little girl is not capable of riding a bicycle.
zh: 那小女孩还不会骑自行车。

en: The girl is skillful with her fingers.
zh: 那女孩手挺巧的。

en: The girl began to cry at the sight of a dog.
zh: 那女孩一看见狗就吓哭了。

en: What a lovely doll that girl has!
zh: 那女孩的洋娃娃真可爱啊！

en: The girl is used to playing all by herself.
zh: 那女孩习惯了自己一个人玩。

en: The girl was not downright homely.
zh: 那女孩倒也不算难看。

en: The little girl did nothing but cry.
zh: 那小女孩除了哭还是哭。

en: That girl has a lovely doll.
zh: 那女孩有个挺可爱的洋娃娃。

en: The girl asked her father to read the book to her.
zh: 那女孩让她爸爸给她读这本书。

en: The girl cherishes a doll given by her aunt.
zh: 那女孩特别宝贝她姑姑送的那个洋娃娃。

en: The girl was afraid to jump down from the roof.
zh: 那女孩不敢从房顶上跳下来。

en: Tears welled up in the girl's eyes.
zh: 那女孩眼里泛起了泪花。

en: The girl can't have done such a thing.
zh: 那女孩不可能干出这种事来。

en: The girls are as busy as bees.
zh: 那些女孩忙得跟小蜜蜂似的。

en: He is curious about how she will receive the news.
zh: 他挺好奇她听到这消息会是什么反应。

en: We checked the document again.
zh: 我们把文件又查了一遍。

en: The paper wasn't important.
zh: 那份文件其实不怎么重要。

en: The document was nowhere to be found.
zh: 哪儿都找不到那份文件。

en: Missing for years, the document miraculously came to light the other day.
zh: 那份丢了好几年的文件，前两天居然奇迹般地找着了。

en: Let the paper be signed.
zh: 把那份文件签了吧。

en: As for the papers, I have custody of them.
zh: 至于那些文件，都在我这儿保管着呢。

en: The document bore his signature.
zh: 文件上有他的亲笔签名。

en: Look over the papers, please.
zh: 请你看一下这些文件。

en: The book is of great value.
zh: 这本书很有价值。

en: So valuable were the books that they were handled with the greatest care.
zh: 这些书太贵重了，拿的时候都得小心翼翼的。

en: Publication of the book was timed to coincide with the author's birthday.
zh: 这本书特意挑在作者生日那天出版。

en: The reviewer is sharply critical of the novel.
zh: 书评人对这本小说的评价挺犀利的。

en: I fainted from the heat, and when I came to, I was in a life raft.
zh: 我热得晕了过去，醒来的时候发现自己躺在救生艇里。

en: At that moment tears ran down the old man's face.
zh: 那一刻，老人家流下了眼泪。

en: I lost my sense of reality at that moment.
zh: 那一瞬间，我感觉一切都很不真实。

en: It was impossible for me not to think of incident.
zh: 我没办法不去想那件事。

en: The incident was etched in his memory.
zh: 那件事深深地刻在了他的脑海里。

en: The event still remains vivid in my memory.
zh: 那件事我现在还记忆犹新。

en: When and how did the incident come about?
zh: 这件事是怎么发生的？什么时候发生的？

en: The accident happened two years ago.
zh: 事故是两年前发生的。

en: Let's make believe that we know nothing about that event.
zh: 咱们就当对那件事一无所知吧。

en: The incident upset him.
zh: 那件事让他挺心烦的。

en: That publisher specialises in children's books.
zh: 那家出版社专门出童书。

en: The publisher gave my proposal a chance.
zh: 出版社给了我的提议一个机会。

en: The meeting gave her extreme pleasure.
zh: 那次见面让她特别开心。

en: He introduced me to his relatives at the reception.
zh: 他在招待会上把我介绍给了他的亲戚。

en: The assignment was too much for me.
zh: 这项任务对我来说压力太大了。

en: The assignment took me longer than I had expected.
zh: 这活儿比我想象的要费时间。

en: We are astonished at the shot.
zh: 那一枪让我们大吃一惊。

en: Put the gun on the table.
zh: 把枪放桌上。

en: The gun went off by accident.
zh: 枪走火了。

en: Let me relieve you of that heavy parcel.
zh: 这个包裹挺沉的，我帮您拿吧。

en: When we came to the crossroads our cab slowed down.
zh: 到十字路口时，我们的出租车慢了下来。

en: That ugly butcher resembles that fictional monster.
zh: 那个长得丑的屠夫跟那个虚构的怪物挺像的。

en: The assembly consisted of people concerned about human rights.
zh: 参加集会的人都很关注人权。

en: The assembly voted to protest against any nuclear armament.
zh: 集会投票决定抗议任何核武装。

en: There were a great many people present at the assembly.
zh: 集会上去了不少人。

en: That week had nothing to do with discrimination.
zh: 那周的事儿跟歧视没关系。

en: The weekly appears on Thursday.
zh: 这本周刊每周四出版。

en: He failed to write to his father that week.
zh: 那周他没顾上给他爸写信。

en: The boat is to leave for England this evening.
zh: 这艘船今晚开往英国。

en: The smell is characteristic of garlic.
zh: 这味儿一闻就是大蒜味。

en: He dates the custom from the colonial days.
zh: 他认为这个习俗可以追溯到殖民时期。

en: The practice is peculiar to Japan.
zh: 这种做法是日本特有的。

en: That custom has little currency in Japan.
zh: 这种习俗在日本已经不怎么流行了。

en: The custom originated in China.
zh: 这个习俗起源于中国。

en: The custom was handed down from generation to generation.
zh: 这个习俗是代代相传下来的。

en: The institution must be protected.
zh: 这个制度必须得到保护。

en: The practice still prevails locally in parts of Japan.
zh: 这种做法在日本部分地区仍然很流行。

en: That habit is acquired, not innate.
zh: 那个习惯是后天养成的，不是天生的。

en: That custom has long been done away with.
zh: 那个习俗早就被废除了。

en: That custom originated with the American Indians.
zh: 那个习俗源于美洲印第安人。

en: The practice has long been done away with.
zh: 这种做法早就被废止了。

en: The province supplies its neighbors with various raw materials.
zh: 这个省给周边地区供应各种原材料。

en: The province is relatively rich in mineral resources.
zh: 这个省的矿产资源相对比较丰富。

en: The legislator of that state did away with outdated laws.
zh: 那个州的立法者废除了过时的法律。

en: The anthropologist says old customs still prevail in the province.
zh: 人类学家说那个省还保留着一些旧习俗。

en: The collection is open to the public.
zh: 这些藏品是对外开放的。

en: The prisoners fought one another like so many mad people.
zh: 那些囚犯跟疯了一样打成一团。

en: The prisoner was released.
zh: 那个囚犯被释放了。

en: The prisoner was set at liberty yesterday.
zh: 那个犯人昨天被放了。

en: The prisoner is in chains.
zh: 那个犯人身上戴着锁链。

en: The convict was pardoned after serving his sentence.
zh: 那个罪犯服完刑后得到了赦免。

en: There is no denying that the prisoner is guilty.
zh: 无可否认，那个犯人确实有罪。

en: The class meets once a week.
zh: 这门课每周上一次。

en: You must not speak Japanese during the class.
zh: 上课的时候不许说日语。

en: Regular attendance is required in that class.
zh: 那门课要求必须按时出勤。

en: The Prime Minister became all the more popular because he never gave way to pressure from the neighboring country.
zh: 这位首相因为从未向邻国的压力低头，反而更受欢迎了。

en: Its neck and head were very soft.
zh: 它的脖子和头都特别软。

en: Judging by the swelling, the man must have been bitten by a snake.
zh: 看这肿的样子，这人肯定是被蛇咬了。

en: The language of that tribe is as complex as any other human language.
zh: 那个部落的语言跟其他人类语言一样复杂。

en: The species will be made extinct by the end of this century.
zh: 到这个世纪末，这个物种就要灭绝了。

en: That kind of machine is yet to be invented.
zh: 那种机器还没发明出来呢。

en: The hand of the magician was quicker than our eyes. Before we could say Jack Robinson, the cards he was holding between his fingers disappeared.
zh: 魔术师的手太快了，还没等我们反应过来，他指缝里的牌就不见了。

en: The glove has a hole in the thumb.
zh: 这只手套的大拇指那儿有个洞。

en: It took the doctor eight hours to do the operation.
zh: 医生做这个手术花了八个小时。

en: The operation is accompanied by a lot of pain.
zh: 这个手术过程会很疼。

en: The letter informed her of his death.
zh: 那封信告诉了她他的死讯。

en: I didn't feel uneasy when I read the letter.
zh: 读那封信的时候，我并没觉得不安。

en: Bruce chuckled to himself as he read the letter.
zh: 布鲁斯读信的时候在那儿偷笑。

en: Don't forget to post the letter.
zh: 别忘了把信寄了。

en: It cost me 100 yen to send the letter.
zh: 寄这封信花了我100日元。

en: How long did it take you to write the letter?
zh: 你写这封信花了多长时间？

en: Did you receive the letter?
zh: 你收到信了吗？

en: I do not remember seeing the letter, but perhaps I read it.
zh: 我不记得见过这封信，不过也许我读过。

en: I looked all over the house for that letter.
zh: 我满屋子找那封信。

en: Post that letter right away.
zh: 马上把那封信寄了。

en: The letter was in the mail.
zh: 信已经寄出去了。

en: The letter will be mailed tomorrow.
zh: 那封信明天寄。

en: The letter was to let her know that he had been ill.
zh: 那封信是想告诉她他生病了。

en: The letter made her sad.
zh: 那封信让她很难过。

en: Who wrote the letter?
zh: 这封信是谁写的？

en: The letter was written in the Queen's own hand.
zh: 这封信是女王亲笔写的。

en: The letter is for me.
zh: 这封信是给我的。

en: The letter reminds me of my young days.
zh: 这封信让我想起了年轻的时候。

en: See to it that the letter is posted this afternoon.
zh: 务必今天下午把信寄了。

en: The letter was wrongly addressed.
zh: 信上的地址写错了。

en: Bill wrote the letter.
zh: 比尔写的这封信。

en: The letter was written by Bill.
zh: 这封信是比尔写的。

en: Who was the letter written to?
zh: 这封信是写给谁的？

en: The letter was consigned to the wastepaper basket.
zh: 那封信被扔进了废纸篓。

en: What's the date of the letter?
zh: 信上的日期是哪天？

en: The letter is dated April 1, 1987.
zh: 信上的日期是1987年4月1日。

en: The content of the letter had an interesting effect on my marriage.
zh: 信里的内容对我这段婚姻产生了一个有趣的影响。

en: The letter was correctly addressed.
zh: 信上的地址没写错。

en: You need not answer the letter.
zh: 你不用回这封信。

en: There is little sympathy in the letter.
zh: 信里没多少同情心。

en: The letter sounds forced, what is worse, insincere.
zh: 这封信读起来很生硬，更糟的是，一点也不真诚。

en: What is the letter about?
zh: 这封信是关于什么的？

en: The letter does not say what time she will come up to Tokyo.
zh: 信里没说她几点到东京。

en: Don't let go of my hand, or you'll get lost.
zh: 别松开我的手，不然你会走丢的。

en: Raise your hand to the sky.
zh: 把手举向天空。

en: The director boasted of his status.
zh: 那个主管在那儿炫耀自己的身份。

en: None of your tricks.
zh: 别跟我耍花招。

en: The arrangements are subject to change without notice.
zh: 安排可能会变，就不另行通知了。

en: He was included in the deal.
zh: 他也参与了这笔交易。

en: The business deal may tell in our favor.
zh: 这笔交易可能对我们有利。

en: She gained 500 dollars from the deal.
zh: 她从这笔交易里赚了500美元。

en: Twist that knob to the right and the box will open.
zh: 往右拧那个旋钮，盒子就开了。

en: That doctrine will no doubt lead to dismal consequences.
zh: 那个学说肯定会导致惨痛的后果。

en: That doctrine will no doubt lead to serious consequences.
zh: 那个学说肯定会导致严重的后果。

en: The main reason is that the subjects were totally unaware of the possibility of shortcuts.
zh: 最主要的原因是受试者完全没意识到可以走捷径。

en: The feeble patient is suffering from stomach cancer.
zh: 那个虚弱的病人得了胃癌。

en: The young couple is getting along together.
zh: 那对年轻夫妻相处得挺好的。

en: The young man was at a loss.
zh: 那个年轻人有点不知所措。

en: The young man saved the girl from drowning.
zh: 那个年轻人救了那个溺水的女孩。

en: The young man knows little of his own country.
zh: 那个年轻人对他自己的国家了解得很少。

en: The youngster resented being treated as a coward.
zh: 那个年轻人很反感别人把他当成胆小鬼。

en: That young man is going to go far in this profession.
zh: 那个年轻人在这一行会很有前途。

en: The young man saved the child from drowning.
zh: 那个年轻人救了那个溺水的孩子。

en: The young man manages a big department store.
zh: 那个年轻人经营着一家大百货商店。

en: The young man saved the girl from a bunch of hoodlums.
zh: 那个年轻人从一群流氓手里救了那个女孩。

en: The young girl was haughty to me.
zh: 那个年轻女孩对我挺傲慢的。

en: The young couple surveyed the room.
zh: 那对年轻夫妇打量了一下房间。

en: I hope the young couple will make up soon.
zh: 我希望那对小两口能早点和好。

en: That young actor is a James Dean.
zh: 那个年轻演员简直就是个詹姆斯·迪恩。

en: This young teacher is loved by all of the students.
zh: 这个年轻老师很受学生们的喜爱。

en: The young woman was carrying an infant in her arms.
zh: 那个年轻女子怀里抱着个婴儿。

en: The young professor is adored by the girl students.
zh: 那个年轻教授深受女学生们的崇拜。

en: The young engineer was deficient in experience.
zh: 那个年轻工程师缺乏经验。

en: The young doctor devoted himself to helping the poor and sick.
zh: 那个年轻医生致力于帮助那些穷人和病人。

en: The young couple were deeply devoted to each other.
zh: 那对年轻夫妇感情非常深厚。

en: I wish I had enough money to buy the car.
zh: 我要是攒够钱买那辆车就好了。

en: He didn't stop the car.
zh: 他没停下车。

en: The car passed through a gate.
zh: 车穿过了一个大门。

en: The young man driving the car was drunk.
zh: 开车的那个年轻人喝醉了。

en: The car didn't move.
zh: 车一动不动。

en: The car made an abrupt turn.
zh: 车突然拐了个弯。

en: It is necessary for that car to have a check.
zh: 那辆车得检查一下了。

en: The car ran out of gas before reaching the city.
zh: 车还没进城就没油了。

en: The car is very fast.
zh: 那辆车很快。

en: The car consumes a lot of fuel.
zh: 这车很费油。

en: The car is ready.
zh: 车准备好了。

en: Away went the car at full speed.
zh: 车全速开走了。

en: The car is exceeding the speed limit.
zh: 那辆车超速了。

en: The car looked good as new.
zh: 那辆车看着跟新的一样。

en: The car isn't worth repairing.
zh: 这车不值得修了。

en: The car is easy for me to drive.
zh: 这车我开着挺顺手的。

en: The car proved to be a slave, so I will not be a master.
zh: 结果那辆车成了个累赘，我不想当它的主人了。

en: The car didn't stop.
zh: 车没停。

en: The car is too expensive for me to buy.
zh: 这车太贵了，我买不起。

en: The car broke down.
zh: 车坏了。

en: The car cost $5000 and did not run well at that.
zh: 那辆车花了五千美元，而且跑起来还不怎么样。

en: Did the car look old?
zh: 那辆车看着旧吗？

en: The car ran down the policeman.
zh: 那辆车把警察撞倒了。

en: The car pulled up in front of the bank.
zh: 车在银行门口停了下来。

en: The car came to an abrupt stop.
zh: 车突然停住了。

en: The car turned abruptly.
zh: 车猛地转了个弯。

en: That car is no doubt in an awful condition.
zh: 那辆车状况肯定烂透了。

en: The car has been kicking around the roadside for weeks.
zh: 那辆车在路边扔了好几个礼拜了。

en: The car is waxed and shining.
zh: 车打过蜡，亮锃锃的。

en: The car left a trail of dust.
zh: 车开过去带起了一路土。

en: The car is parked in front of the building.
zh: 车停在楼门口。

en: That car is quite new.
zh: 那辆车挺新的。

en: None of the cars is mine.
zh: 这些车里没一辆是我的。

en: To some extent, you can control the car in a skid.
zh: 车打滑的时候，多多少少还是能控制一下的。

en: Was the car washed by your father?
zh: 这车是你爸洗的吗？

en: When was the car washed by Ken?
zh: 阿肯是什么时候洗的车？

en: That car's so big that parking it is difficult.
zh: 那车太大了，特别难停。

en: The car made a right turn over there.
zh: 那辆车在那儿右拐了。

en: The car has three rows of seats and is capable of carrying eight passengers.
zh: 这车有三排座，能坐八个人。

en: The car is waxed every other day.
zh: 这车每隔一天就打一次蜡。

en: The car doesn't run fast.
zh: 这车跑不快。

en: The car passed by, raising a cloud of dust behind it.
zh: 车开过去，激起了一阵灰。

en: The price of the car is too high.
zh: 这车太贵了。

en: Permission to use the car was accorded to her.
zh: 同意让她用车了。

en: The back seat of the car will hold three passengers.
zh: 这车后排能坐三个人。

en: The car has a new engine.
zh: 这车换了个新发动机。

en: That car has a roof rack.
zh: 那辆车车顶有行李架。

en: I happened along when the car hit the boy.
zh: 车撞到那个男孩的时候，我正好路过。

en: The car is in the way. Please move it.
zh: 车挡路了，麻烦挪一下。

en: The socialist was accompanied by a female interpreter.
zh: 那个社会主义者随行带了个女翻译。

en: The social worker was asked to follow up the information about the Stevenson family.
zh: 社工被要求跟进史蒂文森一家的消息。

en: The sociologist has a habit of scratching his back.
zh: 那个社会学家有个抓后背的习惯。

en: The firm has its head office in Osaka.
zh: 那家公司的总部在大阪。

en: The photo artist had trouble expressing himself.
zh: 那个摄影艺术家不太擅长表达自己。

en: She put the picture back in his hand.
zh: 她把照片塞回了他手里。

en: The photo takes me back to my childhood days.
zh: 这张照片让我想起了小时候。

en: The picture reminds me of my happy old days.
zh: 这张照片让我想起了过去那些快乐的日子。

en: The picture reminds me of my childhood.
zh: 这张照片让我想起了童年。

en: The photo brought back many happy memories of my childhood.
zh: 这张照片勾起了我很多美好的童年回忆。

en: Let me have a look at those photos.
zh: 让我看看那些照片。

en: Will you show me the picture?
zh: 能给我看看那张照片吗？

en: The photo catches the tension in the court very well.
zh: 这张照片把法庭上的紧张气氛抓拍得很到位。

en: The pictures are pasted on all sides.
zh: 四面墙上都贴满了照片。

en: The photograph brought back memories of my childhood.
zh: 这张照片让我想起了童年的往事。

en: The picture was taken from the air.
zh: 这张照片是航拍的。

en: The picture brought back a lot of memories.
zh: 这张照片勾起了很多回忆。

en: You should stick those pictures in your album.
zh: 你该把那些照片贴进相册里。

en: Some of the photos have been taken at the risk of life.
zh: 有些照片是冒着生命危险拍的。

en: You are holding my hand in that picture.
zh: 那张照片里你拉着我的手。

en: Some of the photos have been taken at the risk of life and limb.
zh: 有些照片是冒着伤残甚至丢命的风险拍的。

en: The copy agrees with the original.
zh: 复印件跟原件是一致的。

en: The play was only a partial success.
zh: 那场戏只能算成功了一半。

en: The play begins at six this evening.
zh: 演出今晚六点开始。

en: The play was a lot of fun. I wish you could have been there.
zh: 那场戏挺有意思的，你要是在场就好了。

en: The play was a lot of fun.
zh: 那场戏挺好玩的。

en: The play ran for six months.
zh: 那出戏连演了六个月。

en: The latter half of the drama was a little dull.
zh: 这部剧的后半部分有点平淡。

en: The grass needs cutting.
zh: 草该割了。

en: I found the field trip very educational.
zh: 我觉得这次实地考察挺长见识的。

en: The success of newly-developed applications and government-forced deregulation may hold the key to achieving this economic implementation.
zh: 新应用的成功和政府强制的放宽管制，可能是实现这种经济运行的关键。

en: The laboratory has the most up-to-date equipment.
zh: 实验室里的设备是最先进的。

en: A group of scientists stood by, ready to record the experiment.
zh: 一群科学家守在旁边，准备记录实验结果。

en: The experiment was made on a hundred unmarried males.
zh: 这个实验是在一百个单身男性身上做的。

en: That experiment was a failure.
zh: 那次实验失败了。

en: The experiment resulted in a miserable failure.
zh: 实验以惨败告终。

en: The experiment proved to be successful.
zh: 实验证明是成功的。

en: I will leave the experiment to you.
zh: 实验就交给你来做了。

en: The experiment failed because of some minor faults.
zh: 实验因为一些小失误失败了。

en: The experiments led to great discoveries.
zh: 这些实验促成了重大发现。

en: It is the attitude of the subjects that controls the outcome of the experiment.
zh: 受试者的态度决定了实验的结果。

en: Close observation is necessary for the experiment.
zh: 做这个实验必须仔细观察。

en: For that experiment they need a complete vacuum.
zh: 那个实验需要完全真空的环境。

en: The experiment confirmed his theory.
zh: 实验证实了他的理论。

en: The businessman appeared on television this morning.
zh: 那个商人今天早上上电视了。

en: The businessman is thinking of receding from the contract.
zh: 那个商人正考虑撤销合同。

en: The businessman didn't dare withdraw from the transaction.
zh: 那个商人没敢退出这笔交易。

en: The question was too difficult to answer.
zh: 那个问题太难了，没法回答。

en: That question is easy to answer.
zh: 那个问题挺好回答的。

en: So difficult was the question that no one could answer.
zh: 问题太难了，谁都答不上来。

en: The question was impossible for us to answer.
zh: 那个问题我们根本没法回答。

en: The question foxed me completely.
zh: 那个问题把我给彻底考住了。

en: The question is by no means easy.
zh: 那个问题一点都不简单。

en: That question still sticks me.
zh: 那个问题还是把我给难住了。

en: If I knew the answer to the question, I would tell you.
zh: 我要是知道这题的答案，我就告诉你了。

en: It is difficult for me to answer the question.
zh: 对我来说，回答那个问题挺难的。

en: It is easy to answer the question.
zh: 回答那个问题挺容易的。

en: It will only take a moment to answer the question.
zh: 回答这个问题也就一眨眼的功夫。

en: Only you can answer the question.
zh: 只有你才能回答这个问题。

en: I wish I could come up with a good answer to the question.
zh: 真希望我能想出个好答案来回答这个问题。

en: The question threw him off his balance.
zh: 那个问题让他一下子慌了神。

en: The more difficult the questions are, the less likely I'll be able to answer them.
zh: 问题越难，我越不可能答得出来。

en: Let's begin with that question.
zh: 咱们先从那个问题开始吧。

en: The failure is due to his idleness.
zh: 失败是因为他太懒了。

en: The failure is due to his carelessness.
zh: 失败是因为他太粗心了。

en: You are to blame for the failure.
zh: 失败了得怪你。

en: It is you who are to blame for the failure.
zh: 失败全都要怪你。

en: The failure depressed him.
zh: 失败让他很消沉。

en: The mistake hastened his retirement.
zh: 这个错误让他提前退休了。

en: This fault admits of no excuse.
zh: 这个错误是没法辩解的。

en: The ceremony was held in honor of the guest from China.
zh: 仪式是为欢迎那位中国客人举行的。

en: The ceremony was simple.
zh: 仪式挺简朴的。

en: Will you take part in the ceremony?
zh: 你会参加那个仪式吗？

en: The deer fell a prey to the lion.
zh: 那只鹿成了狮子的猎物。

en: The deer is three times as heavy as Jane.
zh: 那只鹿的体重是简的三倍。

en: I have no money to buy the dictionary.
zh: 我没钱买这本词典。

en: Keep the dictionary by you.
zh: 把词典带在身边。

en: You should consult the dictionary.
zh: 你应该查查字典。

en: The dictionary comes in two volumes.
zh: 这本字典分上下两册。

en: The dictionary is useful and, what is more, not expensive.
zh: 这本字典很好用，而且还不贵。

en: The dictionary is of great use to me.
zh: 这本字典对我很有用。

en: The dictionary is up to date.
zh: 这本字典内容很新。

en: This dictionary will be of great help to you.
zh: 这本字典对你很有帮助。

en: You may use either of the dictionaries.
zh: 这两本字典你用哪本都行。

en: Please lend me the dictionary when you are through with it.
zh: 你用完之后把字典借我一下。

en: The selfish man was despised by his companions.
zh: 那个自私的家伙被同伴们瞧不起。

en: I got a horrible shock when I saw the car accident.
zh: 看到那场车祸，我吓坏了。

en: Few people were killed in the car accident.
zh: 那场车祸没死几个人。

en: The automobile company laid off 300 workers.
zh: 那家汽车公司裁掉了三百名员工。

en: The automobile runs on electricity.
zh: 这辆车是电动的。

en: Production of this automobile started in 1980.
zh: 这款车是1980年开始生产的。

en: I was accorded permission to use the car.
zh: 我获准使用这辆车。

en: I am insured for the car.
zh: 我给这辆车买了保险。

en: It cost me one thousand yen to get the bicycle fixed.
zh: 修这辆自行车花了我一千日元。

en: Get the bicycle out of the way.
zh: 把自行车挪开，别挡路。

en: That bicycle is too small for you.
zh: 那辆自行车你骑太小了。

en: She's feeling much better thanks to that medical treatment.
zh: 托那个疗法的福，她觉得好多了。

en: The undersecretary was maintained in office by the political bosses.
zh: 那位副部长是在政治大佬们的支持下留任的。

en: He died the next day.
zh: 他第二天就去世了。

en: Then she was a little girl.
zh: 那时候她还是个小女孩。

en: At that time she was engaged in operating a tractor.
zh: 那时候她正忙着开拖拉机呢。

en: She didn't dare to say anything at that time.
zh: 她那时候啥也不敢说。

en: What was he up to then?
zh: 他那时候在捣鼓什么呢？

en: He was leaving then.
zh: 他那时候正准备走呢。

en: At that time, the whole world was hungry.
zh: 那时候，全世界的人都在挨饿。

en: The period is referred to as the Stone Age.
zh: 那个时期被称为石器时代。

en: She was superstitious, as the people of that period usually were.
zh: 她很迷信，那个时代的人大多都那样。

en: The forest was silent then.
zh: 那时森林里一片寂静。

en: It was not until then that he learned the truth.
zh: 直到那时他才知道真相。

en: I blush to think of what a fool I was then.
zh: 想到我那时候那么傻，我就脸红。

en: I hit upon a good idea then.
zh: 我那时突然想到了一个好主意。

en: I was at home then.
zh: 我那时候在家。

en: It happened that I was in New York then.
zh: 碰巧我那时在纽约。

en: I was off duty at the time.
zh: 我那时候刚好下班。

en: We were all running short of money then.
zh: 我们那时候都很缺钱。

en: That schedule is not in use any more.
zh: 那个时间表已经不用了。

en: The picture I saw then was a most entertaining one.
zh: 我那时看的那部电影特别有意思。

en: Will you please adjust the clock? It's slow.
zh: 能调一下钟吗？它走慢了。

en: It is predicted that the watch company will produce over one million new watches a year.
zh: 据预测，那家表厂每年会生产一百多万块新表。

en: The clock is accurate and dependable.
zh: 这钟走得很准，很靠谱。

en: The clock, which my grandfather bought, is still in good order.
zh: 我爷爷买的那台钟现在还走得好好的。

en: Something was wrong with the watch.
zh: 那个表出毛病了。

en: The watch broke down.
zh: 表坏了。

en: The clock is wrong.
zh: 钟走得不对。

en: That watch is a fancy job.
zh: 那块表做工很精致。

en: The watch is manufactured in Switzerland.
zh: 这块表是瑞士造的。

en: That watch is less expensive than this one.
zh: 那块表比这块便宜。

en: The clock gains five minutes a day.
zh: 这钟每天快五分钟。

en: We went on our vacation then.
zh: 我们那时候去度假了。

en: The timetable is not to be depended on.
zh: 时间表不靠谱。

en: The Cabinet conference was all but over then.
zh: 那时候内阁会议基本已经结束了。

en: From that time on, she always waited on him.
zh: 从那以后，她一直伺候着他。

en: I haven't heard from him since then.
zh: 从那以后我就没他的消息了。

en: Since that time we have not seen him.
zh: 从那以后我们就没见过他。

en: From that moment on, he felt undying hatred for his oppressors.
zh: 从那一刻起，他对压迫他的人产生了刻骨铭心的仇恨。

en: Only then did I realize what he meant.
zh: 直到那时我才明白他的意思。

en: My father had never been abroad until then.
zh: 在那之前，我父亲从来没出过国。

en: Up to that time he had been staying with his uncle.
zh: 在那之前，他一直住在他叔叔家。

en: Up to that time, we were watching TV.
zh: 在那之前，我们一直在看电视。

en: I had never felt more alone than at that time.
zh: 我那时候感到前所未有的孤独。

en: There was a parade going by at the time.
zh: 那时正好有游行经过。

en: This was before people knew how to record voices, so we don't know exactly what he sounded like.
zh: 那是人们还不知道怎么录音，所以我们不知道他声音到底是什么样的。

en: I didn't know what to do then.
zh: 我当时不知道该怎么办。

en: I was taking a shower then.
zh: 我当时在洗澡。

en: I'll just cross that bridge when I come to it.
zh: 到时候再说吧。

en: I can't express how happy I was at that time.
zh: 我没法表达我当时有多高兴。

en: See you then.
zh: 到时候见。

en: Not till then did I realize the danger of the situation.
zh: 直到那时我才意识到情况有多危险。

en: It wasn't until then that I felt really frightened.
zh: 直到那时候我才真正感到害怕。

en: Only then did I see the danger we were in.
zh: 直到那时我才看清我们的处境有多危险。

en: It wasn't until then that we knew her address.
zh: 直到那时我们才知道她的地址。

en: Don't forget to let me know when it's time.
zh: 到时间了别忘了告诉我一声。

en: I would have done it at that time.
zh: 我当时本来会做的。

en: It'll be too late then.
zh: 到时候就太晚了。

en: Then I met your father and we moved to the town.
zh: 后来我遇到了你父亲，我们就搬到城里去了。

en: Since then, his faith has been severely shaken.
zh: 从那以后，他的信念受到了严重的动摇。

en: Were you at school at that time?
zh: 你当时在学校吗？

en: What were you doing then?
zh: 你当时在干嘛？

en: You should have said so at that time.
zh: 你当时就该这么说的。

en: At that time, the train was terribly crowded.
zh: 那时候火车上挤得要命。

en: My legs failed me then.
zh: 我当时腿都软了。

en: A good idea occurred to me at that time.
zh: 我当时突然想到了一个好主意。

en: At that time, she was smiling and singing very quietly.
zh: 那时她正微笑着轻声唱歌。

en: I could not understand what the president said then.
zh: 我当时听不懂总统在说什么。

en: Then the motor suddenly died.
zh: 接着发动机突然熄火了。

en: At that time I really understood that gorillas have feelings.
zh: 那时我才真正明白大猩猩也是有感情的。

en: A good idea occurred to me then.
zh: 那时我突然有个好主意。

en: Did you have a sheet of paper then?
zh: 你当时有纸吗？

en: The temple is at the top of the hill.
zh: 那座庙在山顶上。

en: We also went to the temple.
zh: 我们也去了那座庙。

en: It is worth visiting the temple.
zh: 那座庙值得一去。

en: The office was full of activity all day.
zh: 办公室整天都忙个不停。

en: The building to the right of that office building is the Tokyo Building.
zh: 那栋办公楼右边的那栋建筑就是东京大厦。

en: The clerk died from overwork.
zh: 那个职员过劳死了。

en: The dictionary contains about half a million words.
zh: 这本词典收录了大约五十万个词。

en: The situation is beyond my grasp.
zh: 情况超出了我的掌控范围。

en: I think it impossible to deny the fact.
zh: 我觉得没法否认这个事实。

en: There is no denying the fact.
zh: 这是不争的事实。

en: There is no one but knows the fact.
zh: 没人不知道这件事。

en: They are the only people who know the fact.
zh: 只有他们知道真相。

en: I am only too happy to know that fact.
zh: 知道这个事实我太高兴了。

en: Fix the fact in your mind.
zh: 把这件事记在心里。

en: I'm sure of the fact.
zh: 我敢肯定那是真的。

en: You shouldn't make too much of the fact.
zh: 你不该把这事儿看得太重。

en: The fact seemed to irritate her husband.
zh: 这事儿好像让她丈夫挺恼火的。

en: The fact proves his honesty.
zh: 这件事证明了他很诚实。

en: The fact manifests his innocence.
zh: 事实表明他是清白的。

en: The fact cannot be denied.
zh: 事实是不容否认的。

en: No one can deny the fact.
zh: 谁也没法否认这个事实。

en: The facts are buried in a few old books.
zh: 真相隐藏在几本旧书里。

en: The facts became known to everyone.
zh: 大家都知道了真相。

en: The fact was of interest to the scientists.
zh: 科学家们对这个事实很感兴趣。

en: The facts are otherwise.
zh: 事实并非如此。

en: That fact is of great importance from the viewpoint of science.
zh: 从科学的角度来看，那个事实非常重要。

en: The fact is known to everybody.
zh: 大家都知道这个事实。

en: The fact still remains to be known.
zh: 事实真相依然不为人知。

en: The fact is apparent to everybody.
zh: 事实对大家来说都很明显。

en: These facts are mutually related.
zh: 这些事实是相互关联的。

en: The fact is of great importance from the viewpoint of science.
zh: 从科学的角度来看，那个事实非常重要。

en: I must keep a secret with regard to the fact.
zh: 关于这件事，我必须保密。

en: The matter weighs on her mind.
zh: 这件事一直压在她心头。

en: It will not to do blame him for the accident.
zh: 这起事故不能怪他。

en: Describe that accident in detail.
zh: 详细描述一下那场事故。

en: The accident shows that he is careless about driving.
zh: 这场事故说明他开车太不留神了。

en: It will not do to blame him for the accident.
zh: 这起事故不能怪他。

en: The accident happened late at night.
zh: 事故发生在深夜。

en: The accident occurred at dawn.
zh: 事故发生在黎明时分。

en: Did the accident really come to pass last year?
zh: 那场事故真的是去年发生的吗？

en: The accident was due to the drunken driving of a certain film star.
zh: 事故是由于某位影星酒驾造成的。

en: The accident was due to careless driving.
zh: 事故是由于粗心驾驶造成的。

en: The accident deprived her of her only son.
zh: 事故夺走了她唯一的儿子。

en: The accident stemmed from her negligence.
zh: 事故起因于她的疏忽。

en: The accident deprived them of their only son.
zh: 事故夺走了他们唯一的儿子。

en: The accident was brought about by his carelessness.
zh: 事故是他粗心大意造成的。

en: The accident happened through his carelessness.
zh: 事故是因为他的疏忽发生的。

en: The accident resulted from his carelessness.
zh: 事故是由他的粗心引起的。

en: The accident was due to his careless driving.
zh: 事故是由于他驾驶不慎造成的。

en: The accident was due to his carelessness.
zh: 事故是因为他太粗心了。

en: The accident took place near his home.
zh: 事故发生在他家附近。

en: The accident arose from a simple mistake.
zh: 事故是由一个简单的错误引起的。

en: Nobody was to blame for the accident.
zh: 谁都不该为这起事故负责。

en: The accident seemed to have something to do with the heavy snow.
zh: 事故似乎和大雪有关。

en: The accident came about through my carelessness.
zh: 事故是由于我的疏忽造成的。

en: The accident happened before my very eyes.
zh: 事故就在我眼前发生了。

en: The accident happened through my carelessness.
zh: 事故是由于我的疏忽造成的。

en: The accident happened previous to my arrival.
zh: 事故发生在我到达之前。

en: The accident occurred yesterday morning.
zh: 事故发生在昨天早上。
